definition: the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound

sentences.english: Following these rhymes, comes that valuable section of prose material which is generally called experience stories.
sentences.chinese: 韻語之後，是頗爲可觀的散文部分“生活故事”。

sentences.english: The second part it is the rhyme one that is specialized in.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是對《列女傳》韻語的專門研究。

sentences.english: Did you seek the civilian's peaceful and languishing rhymes?
sentences.chinese: 你尋求過老百姓的和平而憂傷的韻語嗎？
